verses.roman:
bhaṭṭācārya lāṭhi lañā mārite dhāila
palāila amogha, tāra lāga nā pāila

synonyms: bhaṭṭācārya—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; lāṭhi lañā—taking a stick; mārite—to strike; dhāila—ran; palāila—fled; amogha—Amogha; tāra—him; lāga nā pāila—could not catch.
translation: Bhaṭṭācārya ran after him to strike him with a stick, but Amogha fled so fast that Bhaṭṭācārya could not catch him.
